subject: urgent ime
body:
hi need ime done asap!!!

patient: michael thompson or maybe thomson not sure how its spelled
case: could be MT-8821 or 8281??? check ur records

needs cardio checkup heart stuff
when: next week sometime afternoon preferably
where: around LA area maybe orange county

attaching whatever files i have boss said report needed like 2 weeks ago so please hurry

lmk
- katie

attachments.text_content: Handwritten notes - difficult to read: Patient Michael Thompson, age 52, chest pain episodes. EKG from 02/15/2025 shows irregular rhythm. Cardiologist appointment scheduled. Patient reports shortness of breath during physical activity. Family history of heart disease.
